completeListOfAbilities.name: Satellite Beam
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
15-hit group ranged  PG attack + group  PF attack
 PG attacks distributed based on number of enemies
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 3 turns Satellite
Triggers additional Beam (4-hit ranged  PG attack +  PF attack; increases BRV by 100% of HP damage dealt) after  PF attacks (chained  PF attacks excluded) while Satellite active
